2022-07-19T03-29-37Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

2022-07-19T03-29-37Z.workflow:
name: 'Check Format and Lint.'

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}

    strategy:
      matrix:
        deno: [v1.x]
        os: [ubuntu-latest]

    steps:
      - name: Setup repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Setup Deno
        uses: denoland/setup-deno@v1
        with:
          # We check only format and lint, so we'll use specific version of deno and ubuntu.
          deno-version: ${{ matrix.deno }}

      - name: Check code is formatted.
        run: deno fmt --check --config ./deno.jsonc --unstable

      - name: Check code lint.
        run: deno lint --config ./deno.jsonc --unstable
